attributes.action: stop pet shops selling all animals and for more awareness about small animal welfare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To acknowlege that all small animals have better welfare rights, including pet shops not to sell them. Introduce facts on how to care for such animals and to stop over breeding and appauling conditions. There are laws in place for larger animals, why should the smaller ones not be included in this, they are living creatures after all.
